DataElement.preferredDefinition: A son or daughter of any age, including biological offspring and sometimes including unborn children, adopted children, stepchildren, foster children and children born outside of marriage; person under an age specified by law._A disorder characterized by persistent feelings of fear and tension and is often associated with symptoms of sweating and palpitations._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A son or daughter of any age, including biological offspring and sometimes including unborn children, adopted children, stepchildren, foster children and children born outside of marriage; person under an age specified by law.

Concepts.definition: An age group comprised of individuals who are not yet an adult. The specific cut-off age will vary by purpose.

Property.preferredDefinition: A disorder characterized by persistent feelings of fear and tension and is often associated with symptoms of sweating and palpitations.

Concepts.definition: A category of psychiatric disorders which are characterized by anxious feelings or fear often accompanied by physical symptoms associated with anxiety.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from caBIG to PhenX for PANH by script 2015-12-21

ReferenceDocuments.name: A questionnaire to assess Anx
ReferenceDocuments.description: A questionnaire to assess Anxiety Disorders, which can   include a number of different conditions such as Panic Disorder , Generalized Anxiety Disorder, Social Phobia, Specific Phobia Agoraphobia, Obsessive Compulsive Disorder, and Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder
